D

decidePath(ArrayList<Edge>, double, double) - Method in class src.Ant
This determines out of the possible paths, which one an ant should take This does it by using the equation: weight * beta / pheromone *alpha We are trying to maximise the pheromone while minimising the weight (or cost) of a path
